ValidationRule.description: Required fields for new business, expansion, renewal, and contraction $User.ProfileId <> "00e41000000iufw",
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "5 - Sales Closed Won"),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Expansion"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Contraction"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Renewal") ),
OR( ISPICKVAL( Is_this_a_Reseller__c, ""), ISBLANK(Launch_Darkly_Billing_Email__c), ISPICKVAL(Payment_method__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Payment_period__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Payment_terms__c, ""), ISPICKVAL( Order_Source__c, ""), ISPICKVAL( PO_Required__c, ""), ISBLANK( Redlined_MSA__c), ISBLANK( Account.LD_Account_ID__c ) ),
NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Admin"))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields in Closing are required: LD Account ID, Account Payable Email, Payment Method, Payment Schedule, Payment terms, Order Source, PO Required, Is this a reseller, Redlined MSA
